title: Italy's falling consumer morale adds to worries
text:
Italy's falling consumer morale adds to worries 11:07am EDT - 01:43
Morale among Italian consumers dropped to its lowest in nine months in May amid the country's long post-vote political stalemate, while in Germany wages rose by 2.5 percent and supporting expectations that the consumer will continue to drive growth in Europe's largest economy. Kate King reports.
Morale among Italian consumers dropped to its lowest in nine months in May amid the country's long post-vote political stalemate, while in Germany wages rose by 2.5 percent and supporting expectations that the consumer will continue to drive growth in Europe's largest economy. Kate King reports. //reut.rs/2IRZtPP
